attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. The Haval H2 is best described as a medium-sized family SUV offering exceptional specification levels at much lower price. Specification levels of the entire range are high with items like climate control, electronic parking brake, hill descent control (on automatic versions), ABS braking with EBD, keyless go, full leather trim, sunroof, electric folding mirrors when locking, a touchscreen infotainment system with reverse camera, electric adjustment on the driver’s seat. Coupled with all this is its stunning looks and great ride.
